about_the_game:
Did your company bring you back into the office? Are you bored out of your mind and want to escape your boring white-collar job? One floor below your current one, floor 34, has been forgotten by upper management and all the employees congregate there to make the most out of their day! Join the Cardboard Battle Tank ranks as either team Desk Division, or team Wastebin Brigade. See you on the battlefield!

Battle your friends in thrilling, top-down, cardboard tank-on-tank combat! Play tried-and-true classics such as TDM, CTF, KOTH, as well as a plethora of unique game modes that will keep you on the edge of your seat!

Customize your tank with a build-point loadout system that has you tailoring your tank to your playstyle. Unlock new tank parts by meeting certain achievement-like criteria to further expand your arsenal! And get new options to customize your appearance, too.

Create levels and upload them to the Steam Workshop; use built-in or imported models. The possibilities are endless!

Simultaneous Network and Splitscreen play

Up to 4 players on one machine and up to 10 players in a match! You can have loads of fun with all your friends.

Lots of Game Modes

Team games, free-for-all games, games that give you additional build points as you progress.

Team Deathmatch, Hold, King of the Hill, Capture the Flag, Frontline, Neutral Flag, Briefcase.

Tank Builder System

Point-based perfection that allows you to tailor your tank to your playstyle with a variety of parts that offer benefits and sometimes tradeoffs!

Progression & Unlocks

Expand your arsenal with tank parts added to your tank builder by completing objectives as you play. Unlock cosmetics, as well, to express yourself!

Level Editor

Create your own maps and even add your own models/textures to the game. The editor is rich and allows you so many options to create something incredible and exciting!

Steam Workshop Support

Download maps from other players to keep your game fresh and exciting (or upload your own)!

Server Browser & Hosting

Join our dedicated servers or host your own matches and broadcast them to the server browser! Or you can play privately with friends only, if that's your groove.

AI Tanks

Optional AI tanks if you want to add more chaos to your matches! Customizable difficulty and personality trails allow you to experiment with some interesting bot tanks in your game.

See you on the battlefield, soldier!

name: Cardboard Battle Tanks: Desk Division

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: 1.5GHZ +
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB VRAM - GeForce 200 Series / Radeon HD 4000 Series
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.3 GHZ
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024 MB VRAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Battle your friends in thrilling, top-down, cardboard tank-on-tank combat! Annihilate your friends with sick bank-shots, dominate the battlefield with a tank loadout tailored to your playstyle, and unlock new parts to expand your arsenal! With Steam Workshop support, theres so many maps to play!
